name: This is MY room
description:
This is MY Room is a horror game made during the Indie Tales Game Jam.
Escape this room as a ghost tries to kill you.
You can move with the arrows, run with Left Control and speak and interact with Space.

No more information will be given to let you enjoy the game !

Art and Code by Linarquo (me)
Sound and Music by Musiciangoblin (or Octa5001)
